title: ‘The White Lotus’ Season Finale and Barry Jenkins on ‘The Underground Railroad’
description:
Chris and Andy break down the season finale of ‘The White Lotus’ and reflect on why the season worked so well (1:00). Then they are joined by Barry Jenkins to talk about the challenges of creating ‘The Underground Railroad’ (40:49) and what’s coming next (1:17:41).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Barry Jenkins
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
